column3: You arrive at Hellgas house - it's eerily quiet and uncomfortable. Dead plants on the porch and a door that looks like it's been kicked in a couple of times.
You get a text saying to walk straight in and go to the first room on the left - presumably her room.
I know that I've come off as rude and inconsiderate - I have to apologise for that. I'm genuinely sorry
I'm a bit of an outcast myself so I understand how it feels to be an outsider with no easy way into new relationships
I was selfish and projected my own insecurities onto you. I was scared of rejection so I rejected you
"I understand.. I didn't appreciate it but I found it kinda sexy
But there's more.. I've been hiding something from you.. Something that might be somewhat of a deal breaker...
All of a sudden Hellga is no longer hot goth gf Hellga but instead an angel - a somewhat biblically accurate angel. It was terrifying to witness
I didn't want to hide it from you but I had to to keep you around. I thought my actions would push you away but I suppose you were horny creep- my mistake
B- but.. I don't understand - how??
